Title: Relates to authorizing a reduction of taxes pursuant to shelter rent
Summary: Relates to authorizing a reduction of taxes pursuant to shelter rent; provides that such taxes shall not be assessed on projects located in New York City.
LawCode: Amd ยง33, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to authorizing a reduction of taxes pursuant to shelter rent
